definitions.definition: Any of a group of large American snakes , of the genus Boa , subfamily Boinae , or family Boidae , including the boa constrictor and the emperor boa of Mexico.

A type of long scarf ; typically made from synthetic or real feathers (or occasionally fur ), and usually worn by being draped across the shoulders with the ends hanging low, sometimes also with a loop around the neck.

main_definition: Any of a group of large American snakes , of the genus Boa , subfamily Boinae , or family Boidae , including the boa constrictor and the emperor boa of Mexico.
secondary_definitions: A type of long scarf ; typically made from synthetic or real feathers (or occasionally fur ), and usually worn by being draped across the shoulders with the ends hanging low, sometimes also with a loop around the neck.
